title: Wrestlers

nouns: Form of combat sport involving grappling type techniques
A sport consisting of hand-to-hand combat between two unarmed contestants seeking to pin or press each other's shoulders to the ground.
The act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
Wrestling is a combat sport involving grappling type techniques such as clinch fighting, throws and takedowns, joint locks, pins and other grappling holds.

description: Two people in the sport of wrestling.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the people wrestling emoji captures the dynamic energy of a match with two figures engaged in a spirited contest, rendered with Apple's distinctive glossy 3D shading and energetic lines. The figures are stylized with soft rounded edges, emphasizing their playful yet competitive interaction. This emoji on Apple devices is a fun and energetic way to represent friendly rivalry, physical activity, or a spirited debate, bringing a sense of playful challenge to your digital communication.
